columns.name: arn
columns.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource.

columns.name: report_plan_name
columns.description: The unique name of the report plan.

columns.name: description
columns.description: An optional description of the report plan with a maximum 1,024 characters.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The date and time that a report plan is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

columns.name: deployment_status
columns.description: The deployment status of a report plan. The statuses are CREATE_IN_PROGRESS, UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS, DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, and COMPLETED.

columns.name: last_attempted_execution_time
columns.description: The date and time that a report job associated with this report plan last attempted to run, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

columns.name: last_successful_execution_time
columns.description: The date and time that a report job associated with this report plan last successfully ran, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

columns.name: report_delivery_channel
columns.description: Contains information about where and how to deliver your reports, specifically your Amazon S3 bucket name, S3 key prefix, and the formats of your reports.

columns.name: report_setting
columns.description: Identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template.
